Diaspora it's not dead at all! I have a profile there which I'm lookin' right now... I don't think that Diaspora will disappear ever, at least not soon..
In fact, I came here 'cause I have seen the notice about ZeroNet there, at Diaspora!

1_1BQg5MQZ63aEQZMzLEXP6yY3hsgznKpaps.body:
D'you think it's so important for the anonymity if someone uses one or another OS? I can't find a reason to understand why denying this information it's more difficult to locate us or identify us, and easier knowing what OS we execute... But I can be wrong, maybe there's one. 
Are there any person capable to offer  us a reason to understand this issue?
